$:/plugins/linonetwo/opened-tiddlers-bar.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/opened-tiddlers-bar/Readme
$:/plugins/linonetwo/opened-tiddlers-bar.creator: LinOnetwo
$:/plugins/linonetwo/opened-tiddlers-bar.text:
!! Features

This plugin provides VSCode style "Opened Tiddlers" top bar

Use the middle mouse button or the X button to close the tab.

Use Shift + mouse wheel to swipe sideways to view.

!! Credits

This plugin is based on $:/plugins/bj/storytabs , which is in MIT license, thank you, Buggyj!

$:/plugins/linonetwo/opened-tiddlers-bar.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/opened-tiddlers-bar/style.css
$:/plugins/linonetwo/opened-tiddlers-bar.creator: LinOnetwo

$:/plugins/linonetwo/opened-tiddlers-bar.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/opened-tiddlers-bar/ui
$:/plugins/linonetwo/opened-tiddlers-bar.creator: [[Jeffrey Wikinson]]
$:/plugins/linonetwo/opened-tiddlers-bar.text:
\define onMiddleClick() <$list filter="[match[middle]]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param=<>/> \end \define opened-tiddlers-bar() \whitespace trim
<$list filter="[list[$:/StoryList]]" history="$:/HistoryList" variable="currentTab"> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/HistoryList!!current-tiddler" text=<>> <$eventcatcher $auxclick=<>>
<$button to=<> class="tc-tab-selected tc-tab"> <$view tiddler=<> field="name"> <$view tiddler=<> field="title" /> <$button message="tm-close-tiddler" param=<> class="tc-image-button opened-tiddlers-bar-close-button"> ×
<$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/HistoryList!!current-tiddler" text=<>> <$eventcatcher $auxclick=<>>
<$button to=<> class="tc-tab" > <$view tiddler=<> field="name"> <$view tiddler=<> field="title" /> <$button message="tm-close-tiddler" param=<> class="tc-image-button opened-tiddlers-bar-close-button"> ×
\end
